fields.name: cha_y6_864
fields.label: F1.11 Welcome

aux.sampleValue:
From April 2013 all social landlords must collect key information to show us how they are achieving the outcomes and standards in the Charter. By the end of August each year we will publish each landlord’s ARC on our website so that tenants and other service users can see what progress the landlord is making. The ARC will also inform our regulatory assessments.

You must complete your ARC by 31 May each year. Please make sure that the senior officer in your organisation signs the ARC off.

We will publish a report for each landlord using key information from its ARC.  We will do this by the end of August each year and will make the report available for tenants and other service users through our website. You must also make the report available to all of your tenants. It is up to you how you do this – it could be through a newsletter or an article on your website for instance – but all of your tenants should be able to access it.

fields.title: Welcome
fields.text:
From April 2013 all social landlords must collect key information to show us how they are achieving the outcomes and standards in the Charter. By the end of August each year we will publish each landlord’s ARC on our website so that tenants and other service users can see what progress the landlord is making. The ARC will also inform our regulatory assessments.

You must complete your ARC by 31 May each year. Please make sure that the senior officer in your organisation signs the ARC off.

We will publish a report for each landlord using key information from its ARC. We will do this by the end of August each year and will make the report available for tenants and other service users through our website. You must also make the report available to all of your tenants. It is up to you how you do this – it could be through a newsletter or an article on your website for instance – but all of your tenants should be able to access it.

fields.name: cha_y6_865
fields.label: F1.12 About the online ARC

aux.sampleValue:
The online ARC has ten sections:
 
* Introduction (this section)
* Landlord contextual information
* Overall satisfaction
* The customer/landlord relationship
* Housing quality and maintenance
* Neighbourhood and community
* Access to housing and support
* Getting good value from rents and service charges
* Other customers
* Validation summary

The Validation Summary flags up any indicators where you need to take further action – for example, because some information appears to be missing or figures do not add up. But please remember that, although the Validation Summary helps you to submit your ARC data, it does not mean that we have ratified your information or approved the processes you use to calculate your performance. So it is important that you have appropriate internal audit controls and quality assurance systems in place to ensure that the information in your ARC is accurate and robust and reflects your performance against the Charter standards and outcomes.

fields.title: About the online ARC
fields.text:
The online ARC has ten sections:

  • Introduction (this section)
  • Landlord contextual information
  • Overall satisfaction
  • The customer/landlord relationship
  • Housing quality and maintenance
  • Neighbourhood and community
  • Access to housing and support
  • Getting good value from rents and service charges
  • Other customers
  • Validation summary

The Validation Summary flags up any indicators where you need to take further action – for example, because some information appears to be missing or figures do not add up. But please remember that, although the Validation Summary helps you to submit your ARC data, it does not mean that we have ratified your information or approved the processes you use to calculate your performance. So it is important that you have appropriate internal audit controls and quality assurance systems in place to ensure that the information in your ARC is accurate and robust and reflects your performance against the Charter standards and outcomes.

fields.name: cha_y6_866
fields.label: F1.13 Validation Summary

aux.sampleValue:
We appreciate that different landlords operate in different ways. Some may appoint only one person to complete their ARC, while others may prefer to have several people completing different parts of it. We have therefore designed the system so that several people can access the system. No matter how you complete your ARC, please remember that your senior officer must sign it off.

There is technical help on screen as well as links to the Charter Technical Guidance to help you. If these don’t resolve any problems you encounter, you can contact us by email at [shr@shr.gov.scot](mailto:shr@shr.gov.scot)

fields.title: Validation Summary
fields.text:
We appreciate that different landlords operate in different ways. Some may appoint only one person to complete their ARC, while others may prefer to have several people completing different parts of it. We have therefore designed the system so that several people can access the system. No matter how you complete your ARC, please remember that your senior officer must sign it off.

There is technical help on screen as well as links to the Charter Technical Guidance to help you. If these don’t resolve any problems you encounter, you can contact us by email at shr@shr.gov.scot
